form.label: Threat List Audit
form.description: Details regarding updates to ES Threat Lists.

table.title: Enabled Threat Lists
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/threatliststats | search disabled=False is_lookup_table=False | eval current_time=time() | eval age_delta=case(threatlist_file_st_mtime <= current_time - (interval + 7200), 2, threatlist_file_st_mtime <= current_time - (interval + 3600), 1, threatlist_file_st_mtime > current_time - (interval + 3600), 0) | eval lastTime=strftime(threatlist_file_st_mtime, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval size=case(threatlist_actual_file_size>=pow(1024,3),tostring(round(threatlist_actual_file_size/pow(1024,3),2))." GB",threatlist_actual_file_size >= pow(1024,2),tostring(round(threatlist_actual_file_size/pow(1024,2),2))." MB",threatlist_actual_file_size >= 1024,tostring(round(threatlist_actual_file_size/1024,2))." KB", threatlist_actual_file_size < 1024,tostring(threatlist_actual_file_size)." B")| eval age_delta=if(isnull(age_delta), 2, age_delta) | rangemap field=age_delta low=0-0, elevated=1-1, severe=2-2, default=severe | rename range as status | sort -age_delta, -age, -weight | fields - eai:acl*, - current_time, - is_lookup_table, - age_delta | fields status, title, type, download_status, size, lastTime, url, weight

table.title: Local Threat Lists
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/threatliststats | search disabled=False is_lookup_table=True | sort +threatlist_file_st_mtime, -weight | eval "lastTime"=strftime(threatlist_file_st_mtime, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval size=case(threatlist_actual_file_size>=pow(1024,3),tostring(round(threatlist_actual_file_size/pow(1024,3),2))." GB",threatlist_actual_file_size>=pow(1024,2),tostring(round(threatlist_actual_file_size/pow(1024,2),2))." MB",threatlist_actual_file_size>=1024,tostring(round(threatlist_actual_file_size/1024,2))." KB", threatlist_actual_file_size < 1024,tostring(threatlist_actual_file_size)." B") | fields title, description, type, size, lastTime, weight

table.title: Disabled Threat Lists
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/threatliststats | search disabled=True | sort -weight | table url type weight

input.label: Threat List Filter
input.populatingSearch: | rest /services/data/threatliststats | search disabled=False is_lookup_table=False | fields title

event.title: Threat List Download Events
event.searchString: source=*python_modular_input.log index=_internal download_task earliest="$earliest$" latest="$latest$" | search url=* stanza="$stanza$"
